    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_b3118dea5d2596fc2d8ca876fdcea8d58bddf38c</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur der Atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure des atomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura dos átomos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura degli atomi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δομή των ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de átomos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is second of five illustrations showing representations of atoms. Here, an atom with three shells and 17 electrons around a nucleus is shown.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nucleus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">particles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chlorine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">shell</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses liegt an zweiter Stelle bei fünf 
Abbildungen, die Darstellungen der Atome zeigen. Hier wird ein 
Atom mit drei Shells und 17 Elektronen um einen Kern gezeigt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est en second lieu de cinq illustrations 
montrant des représentations des atomes. Ici, un atome avec 
trois interpréteurs de commandes interactifs et 17 électrons autour 
d'un noyau est montré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Isto é em segundo de cinco ilustrações que 
mostram respresentações dos átomos. Aqui, um átomo com três
escudos e 17 elétrons em torno de um núcleo são mostrados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è in secondo luogo di cinque illustrazioni 
che mostrano le rappresentazioni degli atomi. Qui, un atomo con 
tre coperture e 17 elettroni intorno ad un nucleo è indicato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι δεύτερη πέντε απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν
αντιπροσωπεύσεις των ατόμων. Εδώ, ένα άτομο με τρία 
κοχύλια και 17 ηλεκτρόνια γύρω από έναν πυρήνα εμφανίζεται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto está en segundo lugar de cinco ilustraciones
que muestran representaciones de átomos. Aquí, un átomo con 
tres shelles y 17 electrones alrededor de un núcleo se muestra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Partikel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
